ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organization

CONTENTS.P: Yderligere supplerende oplysninger

DALO has decided to discontinue the tender procedure as no suitable offers have been received. In accordance with section 28(1)(e) of the directive 2009/81/EC on the coordination of procedures of the award of certain works contracts, supply contracts and service contracts by contracting authorities or entities in the fields of defence and security, a competitive procedure with negotiation without prior publication of a contract notice has been intiated with the participant of the negotiated procedure with prior publication of a contract, who submitted a tender in accordance with the formal requirements of the procurement procedure.

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organization

CONTENTS.P: Weitere zusätzliche Informationen

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organization

P.FT: (Supplement to the Official Journal of the European Union, 6.7.2016, 2016/S 128-230496)
